title: Population, 10,000 BCE to 2023
description: Population by country, available from 10,000 BCE to 2023, based on data and estimates from different sources.

title: Annual number of objects launched into space
description: Annual number of satellites, probes, landers, crewed spacecrafts, and space station flight elements, launched into Earth orbit or beyond.

title: Fish and Seafood Production
description: Fish and seafood production is measured as the sum of seafood from wild catch and fish farming (aquaculture).
source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2024)

title: Number of people living in extreme poverty, 2024
description:
Extreme poverty is defined as living below the International Poverty Line of $3 per day. This data is adjusted for inflation and for
differences in living costs between countries.
source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform (2025)

title: Annual CO? emissions by country
description: Annual total emissions of carbon dioxide (CO?), excluding land-use change, measured in tonnes.
